scripts.minimal: npm run build && npm run uglify && aws s3 sync . s3://time-static-shared/interactives/$npm_package_name/ --exclude '*' --include='script.js --include='script-min.js' --include='index.html'
scripts.stage: npm run build && npm run uglify && aws s3 sync . s3://time-static-shared/interactives/staging/$npm_package_name/ --exclude '*node_modules/*' --exclude='*git/*' --exclude='*DS_Store/*'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run uglify && npm run upload
scripts.test: browserify debug.js > script-min.js --debug && npm run upload
